titles: A sermon of publicke thanks-giuing for the happie recouerie of his Maiestie from his late dangerous sicknesse preached at Pauls-Crosse the 11. of Aprill, 1619. By the B. of London. Published by commandement.
author: King, John, 1559?-1621.
publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Thomas Adams,
notes: The B. of London = John King.
Identified as STC 14984 on UMI microfilm reel 962 position 3.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
